articles.author: Tom Krisher
articles.title: Modest-income buyers being priced out of new-vehicle market - The Associated Press
articles.description: DETROIT (AP) — Two years after the pandemic tore through the economy, America’s auto market looks something like this: Prices are drastically up. Supply is drastically down. And gasoline costs drastically more.

articles.author: PTI
articles.title: If harmed, India will not spare anyone, says Rajnath Singh in a strong message to China - Economic Times
articles.description: Singh, in his address to the Indian-American community in San Francisco, also sent a subtle message to the US that New Delhi does not believe in a diplomacy of  zero-sum game  and its relationship with one country cannot be at the expense of the other.
